t: Kenmore (brand) - Wikipedia

t: Kenmore® Smart Laundry Appliances and Dishwashers Are Now Integrated with Amazon Dash Replenishment
s: April 4, 2019 - Kenmore smart laundry appliances and dishwashers can now automatically reorder goods from Amazon the moment more are needed. In 2018, the brand integrated all smart refrigerators with Dash Replenishment so customers can automatically reorder water and air filters when they need replacing.
